title: Just another PSA
body: Kog'Maw isn't a lame generic crit bot ADC anymore, he's an ON-HIT AD carry so you should build him as such, thank you very much.

replies.body: crit is on hit though, and AD kog has always been best with on-hit damage

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MAuw7hFT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-18T06:04:12.454+0000)
> crit is on hit though, and AD kog has always been best with on-hit damage

Crit is an effectively an on-hit effect that scales with the base physical damage of that attack though. Kog'Maw now has a reduction on that base damage whenever he uses his W, but not on typical on hit effects - as below:

> While Bio-Arcane Barrage is active, Kog'Maw's basic attacks deal 55% damage to non-minions, though on-hit effects are still fully applied.

This means that things like Nashor's Tooth, Wit's End, Rageblade, Blade of The Ruined King and Hurricane (now applies onhit effects too) are going to be much relatively much stronger on Kog'Maw, due to being applied roughly 2x more than other marksmen.
